name: Tetris II Strikes Back
description:
Tetris II Strikes Back is an enhanced Tetris variant. It features two playing modes: the classic Tetris gameplay and a mode in which predefined patterns of stones are already present in the levels and the level is finished if all of those predefined stones are removed.

For both playing modes the game has a two-player simultaneous cooperation mode, in which the (single, not split screen) play field is twice the width of the single player mode. The players can work together to fill the lines and collect bombs to remove uncomfortable stone formations.

shot.caption: Main menu: switch playing mode, amount of players, sound and change keyboard settings
Single player in classic Tetris mode: next stone is displayed, rotate the stones, build rows. You know that. Don't you?
Extended playing mode: you have to remove all the predefined stones to finish the level (in this case the blue ones)
In this case, the heart are the predefined blocks to remove
Two player co-op play: both players add their stones to the same playfield
